[Y]Charset Magic
[W]Tile graphics through redefined
[W]characters.
[c][m.]
[W]Custom character sets are
[W]memory-efficient for UI and map-like
[W]displays.
[W]Consistent tile rules simplify editing
[W]and bug fixing.
[c][m.]
[G]- Define tile set first.
[G]- Reuse motifs.
[G]- Keep text legible.
[m][m-]

[C]A good font is part of game feel.
